content.html: Budgeting is often related with a rigid unchangable limit. New budgeting strategy promotes change. Our lives change! So should the budget. Compensating money allows you to move money between your budgets when you overspend on some categories.

1

Click on the compensation icon that appears only if you have overspent on that category upon hover.

2

Select the categories to be compensated with.

3

If the categories selected are sufficient to compensate the overspent category then the model disappears and compensates it with the categories that you have chosen.
When multiple compensatable categories are present then categories can be chosen and removed until the satifactory compensation is reached or all the categories are chosen.
